content: “I was not a refugee first. I was not a migrant first. I was a child.” I totally agree with this. I sincerely hope their parents do whatever they have to in order to make sure their birth nations respect their natural rights as individuals. That said, if the cultures in their birth nations are so intrinsically flawed that respect for individual rights proves impossible, I hope my nation respects my rights as a citizen by exercising a prudent vigilance about allowing people from cultures hostile to individual rights to come here.
